item.title: Blogging in 2018. Blogs, How Do They Work?
item.description: I started this blog in a different form around 2000. I was in college and loved writing posts about my life. I remember graduating from college in 2001 and having a regular habit of updating my blog. It was one of the main ways I stayed in touch with those who I left in various locales. Whether it was family in Colorado or friends in Iowa - my blog was one of the better ways we connected.
